pageContext.claim: “Oprah's been down to Mar-a-Lago and honestly, we did. Until I ran for office, we were actually -- we did very well. We had a good relationship and I like Oprah. But you know what you don't know? Oprah, when she ended her show, had her five most important people, I assume, her last week. You remember the last week? Well, I was on her full show in the last week. I think they're trying to burn the tape. Are they trying to burn the tape?”
pageContext.analysis: Trump was not on Oprah Winfrey's show during its last week on the air in May 2011, though he did appear in February 2011. Perhaps suspecting that the truth would catch up with him, Trump added the false claim that a tape of his appearance was being burned.
